mapper.insert: insert into sbt_basic (id, city, month, data, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sbt_basic
id,
city,
month,
data,
create_time,

#{month,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update sbt_basic
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data = #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update sbt_basic set data = #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
